SELECT ROWNUM rnum , searched.* FROM (SELECT SEQ_SLE , SLE_NM , PRICE_SALE , CD_CTG_B , IMG , RATE_STAR , CORP_NM FROM TB_SLE tb_sle WHERE COUNT_STOCK > 0 and FLG_DELETE = 'N' and CD_CTG_M = 1 and CD_STATE_SALE = 2
AND SYSDATE >= DT_SALE_START AND SYSDATE <= DT_SALE_END
ORDER BY SEQ_SLE DESC ) searched
